item.title: Need Guthix Portal Fix for Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

LeScape Pk:

i added the code, guess what, IT WORKED, |2code

What did you add, did you add all of what she posted or only part of it. She said to add like things in about 5 or 6 different places. Some of the places weren’t working so if you didn’t add all of then sure it might’ve compiled successfuly. Also I’m not sure where you added the origional code, after all zenzie never specified where to put it. [br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 05:23:28 AM[/size][hr]lescape you suck at following directions. You must have forgot to add some part that’s jacking up the code because I’ve added it 5 times and everytime it doesn’t work. [br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 03:05:56 PM[/size][hr]added it again still got this…lescape you can’t add codes right your messing with it or something.

Zenzie:

Cry in a corner and hope you die from cancer or hope someday you get skills

Oh and your kind of weird for saying that anybody that adds a code that doesn’t work and it doesn’t work is stupider than a 9 year old is kind of weird… That’s kind of like inferring your a nine year old and so is everybody else that adds the code…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2007, 06:34:14 PM[/size][hr][quote=“MisterZ, post:38, topic:95680”]So mean… :([/quote]

item.title: Need Guthix Portal Fix for Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

under

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

add

[code]

public void portals() {
if(portal == 1)
{
saradominportal();
}
if(portal == 0)
{
zamorakportal();
}

public void saradominportal()
{
teleportToX = XCOORD;
teleportToY = YCOORD;
}

public void zamorakportal()
{
teleportToX = XCOORD;
teleportToY = YCOORD;
}

public static int portal [] = {1,0};

public static int randomPortal()
{
return portal[(int)(Math.random()*portal.length)];
}[/code]

under /object click one/

add

if (objectX == 2436 && objectY == 3089) { randomPortal(); } break;

If you can’t complete this a 9 year old is smarter than you.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Guthix Portal Fix for Castle Wars
